ygData.subject: Re: h2h skill cap 40 for lvl 12 HEF bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d think bind wound wound be capped near the max (200?) since every class gets the skill.  Here s a quote from a post that came across this list a while
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 30 May 1999, Adam DeMarino wrote:
>
> Yes, most bard skills are capped at 40. I did not know about h2h(damm
> wanted to train in that too), but 2handers are capped at 1, tracking at
> 1, forage at 40, pick lock at 40, hide at 40, sneak at 40, disarm traps
> at 40. Safe fall, instill doubt, and bind wound are probably too. Corect
> me if I'm wrong. The only thing we aren't capped in are the basic weapon
> skills(cept mentioned), instrument and singing skills, dual wield,
> offense and defense, (though it seems to be 5 pts behind your level,

I'd think bind wound wound be capped near the max (200?) since
every class gets the skill. Here's a quote from a post that
came across this list a while back. Dunno what hand to hand
is capped at, but would guess that it's not the max or else
we'd be as good as monks at H2H. :-)

From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
> That's assuming a maximum ability allowed in a skill.
>
> Bards are capped in the following skills, all at 5 per
> level, excluding trade skills:
>
> Offense:200
> Defense:200
> 1h Slash: 200
> 1h Blunt:200
> Pierce: 200
> Dual Wield:200
> Dodge:125
> Hide:35 (wood elves get inate 50 in this)
> Sneak:75
> Forage:40(wood elves get inate 50 in this)
> Safe Fall:40
> Tracking:35
> Disarm Traps:40
> Pick Locks:40
> Sense Heading:200
> Instruments:200
> Singing:200
> Languages:200
> Trade Skills:200
